desOps: Terracycle is a solution for difficult to recycle items that are not accepted in a traditional waste stream.

Terracycle is a solution for difficult to recycle items that are not accepted in a traditional waste stream.There are several different 'waste streams' you can choose from including candy and snack wrappers, gloves, and hotel amenties.
